name: Central Library
description: A vast collection of books, journals, and digital resources to fuel your knowledge.

name: High-Tech Labs
description: Advanced computer labs with high-speed internet and latest software tools.

name: Sports Complex
description: Facilities for cricket, football, basketball, and indoor games.

name: Transportation
description: Safe and convenient bus facility covering all major routes of the city.

name: Cafeteria
description: Hygienic and nutritious food served in a vibrant environment.

name: Wi-Fi Campus
description: 24/7 High-speed internet connectivity throughout the campus.

name: Auditorium
description: Fully air-conditioned auditorium with a seating capacity of 500 for events and seminars.

name: Medical Center
description: 24/7 Medical assistance with qualified staff and emergency transport facility.

name: Seminar Halls
description: Multiple seminar halls with AV facilities for department-level workshops.

name: Safe Campus
description: 24/7 security surveillance with CCTV coverage and trained security personnel.

name: Green Impetus
description: Solar power plant, rainwater harvesting, and lush green gardens.
